import { useState } from "react" import {useLogInUserMutation} from '../../features/userApi' import {toast} from 'react-toastify' const LogIn = ()=>{ const [user,setUser] = useState({ email:'', password:'' }) const [loginApi] = useLogInUserMutation() const resetInput = ()=>{ setUser({email:'',password:''}) } const submitHandel = (e) => { e.preventDefault() loginApi(user).then((response)=>{ toast.success(response.msg) }) } return (
Registration
setUser({...user,email:e.target.value})} />
setUser({...user,password:e.target.value})} />
) } export default LogIn
